about_the_game:
The Sound of Dread is an RPG Maker official collection of bgm tracks specifically composed and crafted with the horror genre in mind. These 10 songs cover a variety of tones and moods, ranging from haunting piano melodies to more abstract ambient soundscapes.
Inspired by a variety of both classic and abstract horror compositions, these songs are perfect for creating an atmosphere of tension and dread for any horror project.

■ 10 audio tracks designed to build a tense and suspenseful atmosphere and enhance the tone and setting for any horror game.

■ Includes multiple audio formats compatible with “Maker” development software.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------


【BGM Files: 10 songs】

• ”Don’t Speak, Don’t Breathe, Don’t Exist”
• Paranormal Activity
• Porcelain Visage
• Pressed for Time
• Revelations
• The Haunting of Saint Agatha’s Chapel
• Vent Crawler
• Voidcreeper
• What Is That Noise
• Whispers Through The Void
